description:
A sincere new teacher`s creepy-looking face leads to mishaps and misunderstandings when the class sets out to find a peeping tom.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Isai o Hanatsu Shinnin Kyoushi Arawaru / Shintai Sokutei no Sainan / Ryoushinfuzai no Tomodachi no Ie ni Asobi ni Ikou / Mezase! Jump Keisai / Mina-sama mo Zehi Ichido Ashi o Hakonde Mite Kudasai

New Teacher with an Outstanding Feature / The Disaster of the School Physical / Visiting a Friend`s House While Their Parents Are Out / Let`s Aim for a Debut in Jump Magazine! / Please Visit There and Enjoy
異Ψを放つ新任教師現る / 身体測定のΨ難 / 両親不Ψの友達の家に遊びに行こう / 目指せ! ジャンプ掲Ψ / 皆様も是非一度足を運んでみてくだΨ
독특한 신임 교사 등장하다 / 신체검사의 재앙 / 부모님이 안 계실 때 친구 집에 놀러 가자 / `점프 매거진` 연재를 목표로! / 꼭 한번 방문해 주세요
